sentences.en: Before twelve hours had passed a harvest atmosphere would be a bygone thing.
sentences.cn: 十二个小时之后,一片收获的景象就会荡然无存了.

sentences.en: He seated himself close to her, he gazed at her in silence, or he talked to her of years gone by, of her childhood, of the convent, of her little friends of those bygone days.
sentences.cn: 他的生活都集中在这一刻里。 他坐在她身旁，静静地望着她，或者和她谈谈过去的那些年，她的童年时期，她在修女院的情景和她那时的小朋友。

sentences.en: His talk was evocative of the bygone days.
sentences.cn: 他的谈话令人回忆起往昔的时日.

sentences.en: I put these memories with those of bygone times.
sentences.cn: 我把这些记忆与过去的时光一起埋葬了.

sentences.en: I saw him smoking in front of his house but a minute bygone.
sentences.cn: 就在一分钟前我还看到他在他的房子前面抽烟呢.

sentences.en: In part, too , his writing is reminiscent of the pamphleteering prose of a bygone England.
sentences.cn: 他的文体有一部分象旧日英国散文册子里的文章.

sentences.en: Love is an utterly bygone , sorry , worn - out , miserable thing with me.
sentences.cn: 对我来说,爱情已经凋零,变得悲凉凄恻, 一去不复返了.

sentences.en: Most of them spoke of those bygone times with poignant regret.
sentences.cn: 大多数人带着沉痛惋惜的语调谈论着过去的一切.

sentences.en: One historical example is "Slave Trader", by Fatheya Zouhny, conveying a much darker side of life during a bygone era in Egypt.
sentences.cn: 一幅名为“奴隶贩子”历史绘画，出自范缇亚·佐尼之手，展现了过去的时代中埃及更为黑暗的一面。

sentences.en: She looked up some friends of bygone years.
sentences.cn: 她去看望了一些过去的老朋友。

sentences.en: Some lanterns are patterned after palace style lamps of bygone dynasties.
sentences.cn: 还有一些彩灯延袭了古时各朝各代宫灯的样式.

sentences.en: That haunting episode of bygone days was to her mother but a passing accident.
sentences.cn: 那件日夜盘据在她心头的住事,对于她母亲不过是一件过眼云烟的偶然事件罢了.

sentences.en: The buildings reflect the elegance of a bygone era.
sentences.cn: 这些建筑物反映了过去年代的典雅。

sentences.en: The ferry service of bygone days has been replaced by that tunnel.
sentences.cn: 往日的渡口已被那个隧道取代.

sentences.en: The old man told stories of bygone days.
The room had the elegance of a bygone era.
sentences.cn: 这个房间有着旧时代的优雅.

sentences.en: These pillars were known as the Straits of Gibraltar in bygone times.
sentences.cn: 这些石柱在过去被称为是直布罗陀海峡。

sentences.en: This writer has a power of contemporizing himself with the bygone times.
sentences.cn: 这位作家能把古代写得栩栩如生.

sentences.en: Well , pin it on me for bygone days, then.
sentences.cn: 好吧,那么看在过去的份上, 把它给我别上吧.

phrases.tran_cn: 过去的事就让它过去吧（指忘记积怨而和解）

trans.tran_cn: 过去的，以往的，很久以前的，旧式的
trans.tran_en: a period of time in the past
